TopicTitle: KSP 1.1 onward micro freez High CPU usage SOLVED

Articles.Content:
I got 8 core 4.0 GHz AMD FX 8350 procesor with 16GB ram and AMD HD 6870 2GB card on board. From patch 1.1 I got unreal problem with high CPU usage in KSP. Looking for fix problem I found this solution.

 

1. KSP in VAB take up to 70% power of my CPU

High usage

2. Find out what proces make problem in Task Manager (CTR+SHIFT+ESC) select (SHOW ALL USERS PROCES ).

I found than the svhost.exe consume lot of CPU usage with KSP

sample

3. All you need is switch off one service witch this proces use. To do this right click proces and select go to service or click tab service

sample

4. then click Service button to open services

sample

5. Find service Windows Update

sample

6. Right click and select Properyties

sample

7.  Now in star type select OFF or Disable and confirm OK or Apply

sample

8. Last thing is come back to Services right click on Windows Update Service and click STOP

sample

 

After this my CPU cool down to round 40% of usage and allow me to fly without micro freez

svchost.exe is infamous for consuming a lot of CPU.

Problem is, svchost.exe isn't the problem -- it's just a "service host" which runs other things inside it for Windows.  So it's whatever svchost.exe is running, which can be anything from printer drivers to system services, that is eating 100% CPU, and figuring out which that was used to be really difficult.  These days there's a setting in it inside Task Manager somewhere to reveal its sub-process things, I think.
